# doublecloud_workbook (Resource)

Workbook resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String) Project identifier
- `title` (String) Title of resource

### Optional

- `id` (String) Workbook identifier

### Nested Schema for `connect`
